title: Online Rent Payments and Maintenance Requests, Cable Ready, Carpeting
posting_body: ['When you live at Agave Ridge (formerly Spectra East) apartments in Las Vegas, NV, the only thing better than going out on the town is staying in.', "Just steps from your private balcony, you'll find a swimming pool and spa, fitness center, and covered parking within our community.", 'We offer one- and two-bedroom apartment homes with walk-in closets, a private patio or balcony, full-size washers and dryers, kitchen pantries and cozy gas fireplaces.', 'Agave Ridge is in the heart of northeast Las Vegas, minutes from I-15 and I-215, as well as Nellis Air Force Base.', 'Dining options from around the globe are right in your backyard, and incomparable Las Vegas is waiting to entertain as soon as you step out the door.', 'Your neighbors at Agave Ridge can’t wait to meet you!', 'Se habla Espanol.', 'Schedule your tour today.', '-Playground', '-Fitness Center with free weights', '-Carpeting', '-Poolside Wi-Fi', '-Walk-In Closets', '-Cable Ready', '-Built-In Microwaves', '-Air Conditioner', '-Online Rent Payments and Maintenance Requests', '-Intrusion Alarms Available', '-Expanded Cable TV', '-Off-leash Dog Park', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
